summary: This bill, the "District of Columbia Courts Home Rule Act," amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to grant the Council of the District of Columbia more authority over the organization and jurisdiction of its courts. Specifically, it amends Section 602(a) of the Home Rule Act by eliminating paragraph (4), thereby altering the Council's power regarding DC courts. The bill was introduced by Ms. Norton and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
